column5:
Everyday fun: Players can feed Tom when he’s hungry, wash him when he’s dirty, put him to bed when he’s tired, and take him to the toilet when he’s… really got to go! They can watch him grow into a big happy cat!

New mini games: There are brand new mini games to play, including puzzle games, action games, and Tom’s first-ever multiplayer mini game!

column5:
Yalla Ludo, an app with voice chat, allows you to play Ludo or Domino with your friends online.
Real-time voice chat
Talk with players via voice chat at any time, meet new friends and enjoy the game!
Various game modes
Ludo includes two modes: 1 ON 1 mode, 4-Player mode. Each mode has four gameplays: Classic, Master, Quick and Magic.
Domino: Drew Game and All Five.
Play with friends easily
Private rooms and local rooms enable you to play with buddies either online or offline. Come and have fun in games together?

column5:
Water Sort is a simple, fun and addictive sort puzzle game.
?? Your next task is to sort the colored water in the cup until all the colors in the glass are the same. The game is easy to get used to, but it is difficult to become an expert and there are 1000 puzzles to challenge you.
?? A challenging yet relaxing game to train your brain!

Very very addictive, have being play since I downloaded (2days now level 80). Thumbs up for me!??????(G2)The game is just perfect ??? When you're able to get through a difficult level, I feel like you're rewarded with a less difficult level. And this reward discourages you from giving up on the game. column5:
Play with friends! Play with Legends. Play the hit Miniclip 8 Ball Pool game on your mobile and become the best!
COMPETE 1-ON-1 OR IN 8 PLAYER TOURNAMENTS
Refine your skills in the practice arena, take on the world in 1-vs-1 matches, or enter tournaments to win trophies and exclusive cues!
PLAY FOR POOL COINS AND EXCLUSIVE ITEMS
Customize your cue and table! In every competitive 1-vs-1 match you play, there’ll be Pool Coins at stake – win the match and the Coins are yours. You can use these to enter higher ranked matches with bigger stakes, or to buy new items in the Pool Shop.
column7: 1)Game is now UNPLAYABLE!! I Just won a game..... Then it said the connection is slow, then it literally went back in time & put the black ball back on the table!.... Then it said I'd missed my turn & my opponent won..... This is since the update!! Please fix this problem!!(2)great game at first, but if you don't buy anything pretty soon you you don't get break as often, if your going to win and it does not want you to all the sudden there's a slow connection or its waiting for your opponent to respond when it's your turn to shoot. I've had it freeze up where everything works except your pool stick and it stays like that until you leave the game, when you do you lose. on my phone to shutdown an app you have to hit two different symbols but with this it only takes one

column5: The official PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS designed exclusively for mobile. Play free anywhere, anytime. PUBG MOBILE delivers the most intense free-to-play multiplayer action on mobile. Drop in, gear up, and compete. Survive epic 100-player classic battles, payload mode and fast-paced 4v4 team deathmatch and zombie modes. Survival is key and the last one standing wins. When duty calls, fire at will!
column7: (S1)I love this game. I just think there should be like a 15 second grace period so after you land you can't be killed immediately. How can I defend myself? Or everyone can start off with a pan idk. It just seems pointless to lose 34+ rank points when I can't even battle.(S2)Everything is good in this game. Only there is 1 problem. Dresses are so costly and if we buy with BP random dresses come out that even are not for character. There should be an option to share dresses with friends so that males can share girlish dresses with girls and girls can share men dresses with boys.(B1)Terrible. Connection is VERY unstable even on data. The match starts at like 20ping and just when someone shows up it goes up to 677ping and just gets stuck there. At that point the game just freezes and you're the only thing moving until you realize you were sniped like 10mins ago because you were disconnected. Terrible experience. I'd rate it less than a star if I could(B2)I'm still retaining my rating to reply to the developer response. Nothing wrong with my internet connection. Is that this game is getting more and more heavy to load on my mid range phone. Every next update makes it even worse. So I was kind of like giving it up. Consider pushing up your minimum requirements to make it up above on the higher end phones only, so that I can't install this game.

column5:
Carrom is an easy-to-play multiplayer board game. Pot all your pieces before your opponent. Can you become the best at this Carrom Board game ?
With simple gameplay, smooth controls and great physics, travel around the world and play against worthy opponents. Are you up for the challenge?
Customise your pieces with a huge variety of unlock-able items! Show off your style to players from all over the world!

column5: Play the classic and most addictive bubble pop game for FREE, match 3 colors and clear levels. Don’t miss out on this fun relaxing game! In this good old version, you need to aim & shoot, to drop & burst all bubbles. Train your brain with this original puzzle as you blast balls online or offline
